title: The owner of Final plot can develop the slum rehabilitation scheme subject to condition that in-situ FSI of the scheme shall be reduced to the extent of the FSI of such encroached plot already utilized in the remaining vacant plot
clause_text: The owner of Final plot can develop the slum rehabilitation scheme subject to condition that in-situ FSI of the scheme shall be reduced to the extent of the FSI of such encroached plot already utilized in the remaining vacant plot.
section: Slum Rehabilitation Permissible on Town Planning Scheme Plots :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
